message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $180. It's a fantastic deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $160. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $140?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $155, but that's as low as I can go. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $155, but I'm still a bit higher than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $145?
I'm really close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $150, but that's the absolute lowest I can go. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
